Dave Mason, formerly of Traffic, wrote and recorded “Only You Know and I Know” Link: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Only_You_Know_and_I_Know in 1970. Mason had performed with Delaney & Bonnie who released a more successful version in 1970. They recorded a live version on December 7, 1969 with Mason in the band that was on the On Tour with Eric Clapton Link: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/On_Tour_with_Eric_Clapton album. Some musicians probably played on all three versions. Rita Coolidge, who recorded with both Mason and Delaney & Bonnie, covered it in 1971.

I think this was the first recorded version.
